channel.title: Factory on Raghu Vijaykumar
channel.description: Recent content in Factory on Raghu Vijaykumar

item.title: Factory Pattern
item.description: Factory Method and Factory Class Implementation The Factory Method and the Factory Class design patterns, which are essential for creating objects in a way that is both flexible and adheres to object-oriented principles like the Single Responsibility Principle and Open/Closed Principle. The discussion begins by introducing a simple Point class and evolves into explaining how to initialize points using both Cartesian and Polar coordinates while maintaining clean and understandable code.
